data.name: NotifyOnNewClubQuestionLabel
data.value: Be notified when another club manager writes a new question.

data.name: NotifyOnAnswerPublishedOnMyQuestionLabel
data.value: Be notified when a new answer is published on my question.

data.name: NotifyOnAnswerToMyQuestionMarkedOfficialLabel
data.value: Be notified when an answer to my question is marked as official.

data.name: NotifyOnMyQuestionOrAnswerModifiedByAdminLabel
data.value: Be notified when a question or answer of mine is modified by an admin.

data.name: NotifyOnAnyOfficialAnswerInQuestionIrelatedLabel
data.value: Be notified when an answer is marked as official in a question I participated in.

data.name: NotifyOnQuestionIrelatedModifiedByAuthorLabel
data.value: Be notified when a question I participated in is modified by the author.

data.name: NotifyOnNewAnswerInQuestionIrelatedLabel
data.value: Be notified when a new answer is published in a question I participated in.

data.name: ErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred while updating notification preferences.
